prompt_base: hyperdetailed cinematic portrait of an elderly, sinister-looking scientist, long white hair, thick grey horseshoe mustache, black hat with a distinct red ribbon logo, wide jawline, sinister eyes, wearing simple lab coat
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, extreme detailed aged skin texture, deep wrinkles, visible pores, subtle veins, realistic rendering of the mechanical hand/glove, sharp focus on hat logo and glasses
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, CGI, plastic texture, smooth skin, perfect skin, doll, flat lighting, low quality, blurry mustache, youthful skin
